channel.name: Cooking Channel US
channel.title: Burgers, Brew & 'Que
channel.desc: A traditional Rhode Island hot wiener in a crepe topped with chili; a steak patty topped with Chinese char siu slaw and nestled inside a soft steamed bao bun; cold-smoked baby back ribs on a bed of flaming hay; an 18-ounce bacon steak.
